selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the geometric configuration in the diagram and extract relevant measurements or relationships.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to interpret the diagram and extract geometric information that can help determine the value of x.

new_skill_specs.name: analyze_tangent_relationship
new_skill_specs.purpose: To analyze the geometric relationship between a square and a tangent line at a specific point to determine unknown values.
edge_cases: Point P not on the line
